website_summaries.verdict: Goes above expectations to repair dry and damaged hair. This daily shampoo is excellent for treating flaky scalps.
pros: Cleans your scalp and gets rid of flakes and mild dandruff
You can use it every day for a thorough clean
The Seaweed Extract is what helps to purify your hair and scalp
cons: You have to use a lot of conditioner to add moisture

customer_reviews.title: I can't pinpoint exactly why but I didn't like it & neither did my Mom.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my Mom but of course I wanted to try it first haha. Well I didn't like it at all. I had to wash my hair twice for it to feel right (waste of product but my hair is long); after the conditioner I still felt like it tangled my hair all up. Mom has very thin hair that is much shorter. She didn't like it either?
customer_reviews.author: Misty Hicks

customer_reviews.title: I threw them the garbage. Re LED Garlands
customer_reviews.text: LED Garlands broke apart at the switch. The lights blew on contact with the battery switch. I threw them the garbage. Re LED Garlands, Crystal Beaded, Cool White Lights. Bumble and Bumble Seaweed Shampoo 8.0 oz... Excellent. Gentle on scalp and gives volume and body to hair. A little squeeze of the shampoo from the plastic bottle goes a long way.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Ann Sullivan

customer_reviews.title: Damaged Enroute
customer_reviews.text: I tried to purchase this twice. First shipment about 1/4 of the bottle had spilled. Second shipment the plastic bottle had split open and the bottle was nearly empty. Amazon, you need to find a better way to ship this product. I do like this shampoo for my fine hair but will need to purchase it, intact, locally.
customer_reviews.author: Sal

customer_reviews.title: My hair loves it
customer_reviews.text: Love this shampoo- balances my hair perfectly without drying out my scalp
customer_reviews.author: ParisPieInTheSky

customer_reviews.title: Cleans well
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this shampoo for years and still love it. It is unscented.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Daughter loves this stuff!
customer_reviews.text: Tried it for her as a stocking stuffer for Christmas and she loved it. Thought she might like to try another brand so last Oder I place ordered her a different brand. We'll she made me go back to Bumble & Bumble!!
customer_reviews.author: AR

customer_reviews.title: Love it. Have used for years.
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this shampoo for years. I love it. It has a very light, non-perfumey, scent, and it gets my hair clean and shiny without being harsh. Thank goodness they took the parabens out a few years ago, because I was a little nervous about that. This shampoo is my big splurge. Only 1 complaint: when it gets to the bottom of the bottle, the shampoo gets a little waxy or something, and it doesn't clean as well.
customer_reviews.author: R.S. Rabin

customer_reviews.title: BEST shampoo for fine hair and product buildup!
customer_reviews.text: By far the BEST shampoo I have ever used. I was having major issues with product buildup and this shampoo did miracles! Its lightweight but does the job on my fine hair!
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Not for dry skin
customer_reviews.text: Generally I love this shampoo, but if you get any dandruff or have dry skin it won’t work well at all.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Loreno

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love- I have a flaky scalp and this product fixed it- ordering again.
customer_reviews.author: Norma

customer_reviews.title: A great shampoo
customer_reviews.text: We love Bumble and Bumble hair products. This seaweed shampoo smells very nice and is very gently on your hair and scalp. It goes well with the seaweed conditioner.
customer_reviews.author: Sophie

customer_reviews.title: Great product, needs better packaging.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It’s my second time ordering it. It leaves my hair feeling clean and shiny. The scent is very subtle which I enjoy. Unfortunately the bottle was put in a plastic bag that was too small and it caused the bottle to open and some of the shampoo to spill out. Luckily, it wasn’t too much so I decided to keep the product since I love this shampoo.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Bermudez

customer_reviews.title: B&B seaweed shampoo
customer_reviews.text: after using the B&B creme de coco, I had high expectations for this shampoo and conditioner...while they work fine, they smell bad! reminds me of absorbine jr. that my grandmother used to use!! may be great for hair, but not a pleasant scent...
customer_reviews.author: dr.dd

customer_reviews.title: Money Well Spent
customer_reviews.text: I must confess that my first knowledge of the name, Bumble & Bumble was in an interview with a country music celebrity. I thought, well, if it's good enough for them...... Then I looked at the price. Geez, more than I usually spend. After all isn't shampoo, soap? Isn't conditioner just oil? But my curiosity got the best of me and I ordered the Seaweed Shampoo and Conditioner from Amazon.com. Boy was I surprised! The shampoo didn't dry out my hair. The conditioner-didn't need a lot, and it didn't grease up my hair. This product is well worth the investment in gorgeous and healthy heair.
customer_reviews.author: Duane Allman

customer_reviews.title: A wonderful gentle shampoo
customer_reviews.text: I have fine dark hair with blonde highlights. Most shampoo's strip color right out from my hair. This one didn't. It makes my hair feel thick and soft. I buy mine from a salon authorized to carry Bumble and Bumble products. I get the huge bottle for 35 bucks. It lasts my husband and I about 3 months.
customer_reviews.author: Product Junkie
